name: snowstar socks
sizes_available: unisex medium, depending on length made
notes:
i designed the snowstar socks with durasport yarn from canada's beloved woollen mill, [briggs & little][1], with a contrasting fluffy yarn, to give the socks a comfy-cosy feel.

although this pattern is written for double pins, cuff-down, you can work it on circular needles, and toe-up. 

the pattern is written for 64 sts, but you can customize the 8 stitch pattern repeat to 56 and 72 sts.

they're worked on 2.5 mm/us 1.5 needles, but you can go up or down, depending on the yarn you use. i used a sport weight yarn, but this pattern would be fine in fingering weight.



  [1]: https://briggsandlittle.com/
